member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem
member.summary: Represents an item in the GanttChartView control aware of its indentation, expansion state (can be expanded or collapsed), start date and time, effort, etc. It is recommended to set at least these data properties: Indentation, Content, Start, Effort, Assignments. These data properties can also be set: IsExpanded, Schedule, Predecessors, Duration, Finish, IsMilestone, Completion, IsCompleted, Cost.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Indentation
member.summary: Gets or sets the indentation level of this GanttChartViewItem. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the tasks, so that a task with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent task for the tasks with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the expansion indicator of this GanttChartViewItem. If a parent task is expanded its child tasks become visible. If a parent task is collapsed its child tasks become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Schedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the schedule of this GanttChartViewItem. The task schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that can be used as work time for achieving completion of the task. If a child task schedule is not set, the parent task schedule is used. If a root task schedule is not set the Continuous schedule is used. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date and time of this GanttChartViewItem. The start date and time of a parent task will be based on the start date and time values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Effort
member.summary: Gets or sets the effort of this GanttChartViewItem. The effort of a parent task will be based on the effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.CompletedEffort
member.summary: Gets or sets the completed effort of this GanttChartViewItem. The completed effort of a parent task will be based on the completed effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Assignments
member.summary: Gets or sets the assignment item collection of this GanttChartViewItem. You can use a collection of AssignmentItem objects as the task assignment item collection. Note that the assignment item collection is ignored for parent tasks. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.DlhSoft#Windows#Data#ITaskItem#Assignments
member.summary: Enumerates or populates the assignment item collection of this GanttChartViewItem. When setting this property you must use an IAssignmentItem object collection.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Predecessors
member.summary: Gets or sets the predecessor item collection of this GanttChartViewItem. The predecessor item collection is used to indicate dependencies between tasks. You can use a collection of PredecessorItem objects as the task predecessor item collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.DlhSoft#Windows#Data#ITaskItem#Predecessors
member.summary: Enumerates or populates the predecessor item collection of this TaskItem. When setting this property you must use an IPredecessorItem object collection.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of this GanttChartViewItem. Task duration is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The duration of a parent task will be based on the duration values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Finish
member.summary: Gets or sets the finish date and time of this GanttChartViewItem. Task finish date and time is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The finish date and time of a parent task will be based on the finish date and time values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.IsMilestone
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this GanttChartViewItem represents a milestone. A milestone task has its Effort value set to zero. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Completion
member.summary: Gets or sets the completion rate of this GanttChartViewItem. Task completion rate is computed automatically based on effort and completed effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.IsCompleted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this GanttChartViewItem is completed. A completed task has its CompletedEffort value equal to Effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.AssignmentsString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representation of the predecessor collection of this GanttChartViewItem. The assignments string is of this form: John, Diane [80%]. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.PredecessorsString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representation of the predecessor collection of this GanttChartViewItem. The predecessors string is of this form: 1, 2SS, 3FF+2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.IndexString
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representation of the index of this GanttChartViewItem. The value of this property can be automatically computed based on the position of the task in the task collection. The index string is of this form: 1, 2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.GanttChartViewItem.Cost
member.summary: Gets or sets the cost of this GanttChartViewItem. Task cost can be computed automatically based on duration and assignments. The cost of a parent task will be based on the cost values of its children. However a specific task cost can be set and will be used instead if it is higher than the automatically computed cost. This is a dependency property.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartView
member.summary: Represents a control that displays an interactive Gantt Chart based on task data items. Use Items property to add task data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own task data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: IndentationMemberPath, ContentMemberPath, StartMemberPath, EffortMemberPath, CompletedEffortMemberPath, AssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath, ResourceContentMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: IsExpandedMemberPath, ScheduleMemberPath, PredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, DurationMemberPath, FinishMemberPath, IsMilestoneMemberPath, CompletionMemberPath, IsCompletedMemberPath, CostMemberPath, MinStartMemberPath, MaxStartMemberPath, MinFinishMemberPath, MaxFinishMemberPath, ResourceScheduleMemberPath, ResourceCostPerUsageMemberPath, ResourceCostPerHourMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase
member.summary: Represents the base for a control that displays an interactive Gantt Chart based on task data items. Use Items property to add task data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own task data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: IndentationMemberPath, ContentMemberPath, StartMemberPath, EffortMemberPath, CompletedEffortMemberPath, AssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath, ResourceContentMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: IsExpandedMemberPath, ScheduleMemberPath, PredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, DurationMemberPath, FinishMemberPath, IsMilestoneMemberPath, CompletionMemberPath, IsCompletedMemberPath, CostMemberPath, MinStartMemberPath, MaxStartMemberPath, MinFinishMemberPath, MaxFinishMemberPath, ResourceScheduleMemberPath, ResourceCostPerUsageMemberPath, ResourceCostPerHourMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.summary: Gets the value of the ItemBackground attached property for a specified element such as an entity item, overriding the default value provided by the ChartViewBase control. The ItemBackground property value indicates the Brush that specifies how the background of an entity item is painted in the ChartViewBase control. member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.IndentationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Int32 value on the source task item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source task item. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the tasks, so that a task with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent task for the tasks with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.IsExpandedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source task item. If a parent task is expanded its child tasks become visible. If a task node is collapsed its child tasks become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ContentMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on the source task item to serve as the task content, or null to indicate that the content is not provided by the source task item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ScheduleMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Schedule value on the source task item to serve as the task schedule, or null to indicate that the schedule is not provided by the source task item. The task schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that can be used as work time for achieving completion of the task. If a child task schedule is not set, the parent task schedule is used. If a root task schedule is not set the value of the Schedule property of the TaskGanttChartViewBase control is used. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.StartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task start date and time, or null to indicate that the start date and time is not provided by the source task item. The start date and time of a parent task will be based on the start date and time values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.MinStartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task minimum start date and time, or null to indicate that the minimum start date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.MaxStartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task maximum start date and time, or null to indicate that the maximum start date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.EffortMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task effort, or null to indicate that the effort is not provided by the wrapped object. The effort of a parent task will be based on the effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.CompletedEffortMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task completed effort, or null to indicate that the completed effort is not provided by the wrapped object. The completed effort of a parent task will be based on the completed effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignmentsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an IEnumerable value on the source task item to serve as the task assignment item collection, or null to indicate that the assignment item collection is not provided by the source task item. You can use a collection of AssignmentItem objects as the task assignment item collection. Note that the assignment item collection is ignored for parent tasks. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source task assignment item to serve as the assigned resource item, or null to indicate that the assigned resource item is not provided by the source task assignment item. You can use a ResourceItem object as the assigned resource item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source task assignment item to serve as the task assigned allocation units value, or null to indicate that the allocation units value is not provided by the source task assignment item. The assigned allocation units value represents the percent of the resource availability to consider for the assignment, and is used when computing the task cost or can be used when determining the resource availability for a specific time interval. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.PredecessorsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to to an IEnumerable value on the source task item to serve as the task predecessor item collection, or null to indicate that the predecessor item collection is not provided by the source task item. The predecessor item collection is used to indicate dependencies between tasks. You can use a collection of PredecessorItem objects as the task predecessor item collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor task item, or null to indicate that the task item is not provided by the source task predecessor item. You can use a TaskItem object as the predecessor task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DependencyType value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor dependency type, or null to indicate that the dependency type is not provided by the source task predecessor item. Predecessor dependency type indicates how the current task depends on the predecessor task. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.PredecessorLagMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor lag, or null to indicate that the lag is not provided by the source task predecessor item. Predecessor lag indicates when the current task depends on the predecessor task. If lag is zero the dependency is applied at the appropriate time. If lag is positive the dependency is applied so that there will be an exclusion interval between the tasks. If lag is negative the dependency is applied so that there will be an intersection interval between the tasks. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.DurationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task duration, or null to indicate that the duration is not provided by the source task item. Task duration is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The duration of a parent task will be based on the duration values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.FinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task finish date and time, or null to indicate that the finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. Task finish date and time is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The finish date and time of a parent task will be based on the finish date and time values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.MinFinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task minimum finish date and time, or null to indicate that the minimum finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.MaxFinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task maximum finish date and time, or null to indicate that the maximum finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.IsMilestoneMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the task milestone indicator, or null to indicate that the milestone indicator is not provided by the source task item. A milestone task has its effort value set to zero. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.CompletionMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on the source task item to serve as the task completion rate, or null to indicate that the completion rate is not provided by the source task item. Task completion rate is computed automatically based on effort and completed effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.IsCompletedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the task milestone indicator, or null to indicate that the milestone indicator is not provided by the source task item. A completed task has its completed effort value equal to effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignmentsStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the task assignment item collection, or null to indicate that the string representation of the assignment item collection is not provided by the source task item. The assignments string is of this form: John, Diane [80%]. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.IndexStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the index of the task, or null to indicate that the string representation of the index is not provided by the source task item. The index string is automatically computed based on the position of the task in the task collection and is of this form: 1, 2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.PredecessorsStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the task predecessor item collection, or null to indicate that the string representation of the predecessor item collection is not provided by the source task item. The predecessors string is of this form: 1, 2SS, 3FF+2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.CostMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on the source task item to serve as the task cost, or null to indicate that the cost is not provided by the source task item. Task cost can be computed automatically based on duration and assignments. The cost of a parent task will be based on the cost values of its children. However a specific task cost can be set and will be used instead if it is higher than the automatically computed cost. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignableResourceItems
member.summary: Gets the resource collection used to by this TaskGanttChartViewBase as available resources.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignableResourceItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a resource collection used by this TaskGanttChartViewBase as available resources. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ResourceContentMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source resource item to serve as the resource content, or null to indicate that the content is not provided by the source resource item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ResourceScheduleMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Schedule value on a source resource item to serve as the resource schedule, or null to indicate that the schedule is not provided by the source resource item. The resource schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that the resource can use as work time for achieving completion of a task, restricting the task schedule further. If the resource schedule is not set it means that the resource can use any time interval as work time, and the task schedule is not restricted. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ResourceCostPerUsageMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source resource item to serve as the resource cost per usage, or null to indicate that the cost per usage is not provided by the source resource item. The resource cost per usage is applied when computing a task cost, one time for each assignment, without considering the task duration or the assigned allocation units. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ResourceCostPerHourMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source resource item to serve as the resource cost per hour, or null to indicate that the cost per hour is not provided by the source resource item. The resource cost per hour is applied when computing a task cost, proportionally for each assignment, considering the task duration and the assigned allocation units. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.TaskManager
member.summary: Gets the TaskManager object that is used internally for managing tasks displayed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.TaskManagerSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom TaskManager object to use internally within this TaskGanttChartViewBase. When this property is set to a task manager instance the control items collection and the associated data member properties are ignored. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ManagedTasks
member.summary: Gets the task collection managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignableResourceManager
member.summary: Gets the ResourceManager object that is used internally for managing assignable resources used by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.ManagedAssignableResources
member.summary: Gets the assignable resource collection managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AssignableResourceCount
member.summary: Gets the count of assignable resources managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AreTaskEffortValueConstraintsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the task effort values are constrained so that task duration updates are interpreted as assignment allocation units updates when assignments are available in the TaskGanttChartViewBase control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AreTaskDependencyConstraintsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dependent task values are constrained and automatically computed in the TaskGanttChartViewBase control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.AreSummaryTaskValueConstraintsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the summary task values are constained and automatically computed in the TaskGanttChartViewBase control. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.RootNodes
member.summary: Gets the root tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.RootCount
member.summary: Gets the count of root tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.LeafNodes
member.summary: Gets the leaf tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.LeafCount
member.summary: Gets the count of leaf tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.RootTasks
member.summary: Enumerates the root tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. The dependency property is RootNodes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.LeafTasks
member.summary: Enumerates the leaf tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. The dependency property is LeafNodes.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.OverallStart
member.summary: Gets the overall start date and time of the tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.OverallEffort
member.summary: Gets the overall effort of the tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.OverallCompletedEffort
member.summary: Gets the overall completed effort of the tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.OverallCompletion
member.summary: Gets the overall completion percent of the tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.OverallIsCompleted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether all the tasks managed by this TaskGanttChartViewBase are completed. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartViewBase.OverallFinish

member.name: M:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartView.GetStandardBarFill(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the value of the StandardBarFill attached property for a specified element such as a task item, overriding the default value provided by the GanttChartView control. The StandardBarFill property value indicates a Brush that specifies how the interior of a standard task bar is painted in the GanttChartView control. Overriding the default value for a specific item requires that the IsItemAppearanceApplied property of the control to be set to true.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.LoadChartResourceListView
member.summary: Represents a control that displays an interactive Load Chart with an associated resource list view based on resource data items. Use Items property to add resource data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own resource data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: ContentMemberPath, TaskIndentationMemberPath, TaskContentMemberPath, TaskStartMemberPath, TaskEffortMemberPath, TaskCompletedEffortMemberPath, TaskAssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: ScheduleMemberPath, CostPerUsageMemberPath, CostPerHourMemberPath, TaskIsExpandedMemberPath, TaskScheduleMemberPath, TaskPredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, TaskDurationMemberPath, TaskFinishMemberPath, TaskIsMilestoneMemberPath, TaskCompletionMemberPath, TaskIsCompletedMemberPath, TaskCostMemberPath, TaskMinStartMemberPath, TaskMaxStartMemberPath, TaskMinFinishMemberPath, TaskMaxFinishMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase
member.summary: Represents the base for a control that displays an interactive Gantt Chart with an associated resource list view based on resource data items. Use Items property to add resource data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own resource data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: ContentMemberPath, TaskIndentationMemberPath, TaskContentMemberPath, TaskStartMemberPath, TaskEffortMemberPath, TaskCompletedEffortMemberPath, TaskAssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: ScheduleMemberPath, CostPerUsageMemberPath, CostPerHourMemberPath, TaskIsExpandedMemberPath, TaskScheduleMemberPath, TaskPredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, TaskDurationMemberPath, TaskFinishMemberPath, TaskIsMilestoneMemberPath, TaskCompletionMemberPath, TaskIsCompletedMemberPath, TaskCostMemberPath, TaskMinStartMemberPath, TaskMaxStartMemberPath, TaskMinFinishMemberPath, TaskMaxFinishMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartEntityListViewBase

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskIndentationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Int32 value on the source task item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source task item. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the tasks, so that a task with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent task for the tasks with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskIsExpandedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source task item. If a parent task is expanded its child tasks become visible. If a task node is collapsed its child tasks become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskContentMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on the source task item to serve as the task content, or null to indicate that the content is not provided by the source task item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskScheduleMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Schedule value on the source task item to serve as the task schedule, or null to indicate that the schedule is not provided by the source task item. The task schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that can be used as work time for achieving completion of the task. If a child task schedule is not set, the parent task schedule is used. If a root task schedule is not set the value of the Schedule property of the ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase control is used. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskStartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task start date and time, or null to indicate that the start date and time is not provided by the source task item. The start date and time of a parent task will be based on the start date and time values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskMinStartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task minimum start date and time, or null to indicate that the minimum start date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskMaxStartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task maximum start date and time, or null to indicate that the maximum start date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskEffortMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task effort, or null to indicate that the effort is not provided by the wrapped object. The effort of a parent task will be based on the effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskCompletedEffortMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task completed effort, or null to indicate that the completed effort is not provided by the wrapped object. The completed effort of a parent task will be based on the completed effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskAssignmentsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an IEnumerable value on the source task item to serve as the task assignment item collection, or null to indicate that the assignment item collection is not provided by the source task item. You can use a collection of AssignmentItem objects as the task assignment item collection. Note that the assignment item collection is ignored for parent tasks. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source task assignment item to serve as the assigned resource item, or null to indicate that the assigned resource item is not provided by the source task assignment item. You can use a ResourceItem object as the assigned resource item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source task assignment item to serve as the task assigned allocation units value, or null to indicate that the allocation units value is not provided by the source task assignment item. The assigned allocation units value represents the percent of the resource availability to consider for the assignment, and is used when computing the task cost or can be used when determining the resource availability for a specific time interval. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskPredecessorsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to to an IEnumerable value on the source task item to serve as the task predecessor item collection, or null to indicate that the predecessor item collection is not provided by the source task item. The predecessor item collection is used to indicate dependencies between tasks. You can use a collection of PredecessorItem objects as the task predecessor item collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor task item, or null to indicate that the task item is not provided by the source task predecessor item. You can use a TaskItem object as the predecessor task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DependencyType value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor dependency type, or null to indicate that the dependency type is not provided by the source task predecessor item. Predecessor dependency type indicates how the current task depends on the predecessor task. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.PredecessorLagMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor lag, or null to indicate that the lag is not provided by the source task predecessor item. Predecessor lag indicates when the current task depends on the predecessor task. If lag is zero the dependency is applied at the appropriate time. If lag is positive the dependency is applied so that there will be an exclusion interval between the tasks. If lag is negative the dependency is applied so that there will be an intersection interval between the tasks. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskDurationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task duration, or null to indicate that the duration is not provided by the source task item. Task duration is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The duration of a parent task will be based on the duration values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskFinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task finish date and time, or null to indicate that the finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. Task finish date and time is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The finish date and time of a parent task will be based on the finish date and time values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskMinFinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task minimum finish date and time, or null to indicate that the minimum finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskMaxFinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task maximum finish date and time, or null to indicate that the maximum finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskIsMilestoneMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the task milestone indicator, or null to indicate that the milestone indicator is not provided by the source task item. A milestone task has its effort value set to zero. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskCompletionMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on the source task item to serve as the task completion rate, or null to indicate that the completion rate is not provided by the source task item. Task completion rate is computed automatically based on effort and completed effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskIsCompletedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the task milestone indicator, or null to indicate that the milestone indicator is not provided by the source task item. A completed task has its completed effort value equal to effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskAssignmentsStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the task assignment item collection, or null to indicate that the string representation of the assignment item collection is not provided by the source task item. The assignments string is of this form: John, Diane [80%]. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskIndexStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the index of the task, or null to indicate that the string representation of the index is not provided by the source task item. The index string is automatically computed based on the position of the task in the task collection and is of this form: 1, 2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskPredecessorsStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the task predecessor item collection, or null to indicate that the string representation of the predecessor item collection is not provided by the source task item. The predecessors string is of this form: 1, 2SS, 3FF+2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.TaskCostMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on the source task item to serve as the task cost, or null to indicate that the cost is not provided by the source task item. Task cost can be computed automatically based on duration and assignments. The cost of a parent task will be based on the cost values of its children. However a specific task cost can be set and will be used instead if it is higher than the automatically computed cost. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.AssignableTaskItems
member.summary: Gets the task collection used to by this ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase as available tasks.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.AssignableTaskItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a task collection used by this ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase as available tasks. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.ContentMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source resource item to serve as the resource content, or null to indicate that the content is not provided by the source resource item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.ScheduleMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Schedule value on a source resource item to serve as the resource schedule, or null to indicate that the schedule is not provided by the source resource item. The resource schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that the resource can use as work time for achieving completion of a task, restricting the task schedule further. If the resource schedule is not set it means that the resource can use any time interval as work time, and the task schedule is not restricted. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.CostPerUsageMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source resource item to serve as the resource cost per usage, or null to indicate that the cost per usage is not provided by the source resource item. The resource cost per usage is applied when computing a task cost, one time for each assignment, without considering the task duration or the assigned allocation units. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartEntityListViewBase.CostPerHourMemberPath

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Data.ScheduleChartViewItem.Schedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the schedule of this ScheduleChartViewItem. The resource schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that the resource can use as work time for achieving completion of a task, restricting the task schedule further. If the resource schedule is not set it means that the resource can use any time interval as work time, and the task schedule is not restricted. This is a dependency property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the cost per hour of this ScheduleChartViewItem. The resource cost per hour is applied when computing a task cost, proportionally for each assignment, considering the task duration and the assigned allocation units. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.ShortDate
member.summary: Gets the short date-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the d pattern, resulting values such as 1/1/2008, and 12/31/2008.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.LongDate
member.summary: Gets the long date-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the D pattern, resulting values such as Tuesday, January 1, 2008, and Wednesday, December 31, 2008.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DateTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the g pattern, resulting values such as 1/1/2008 9:00 AM, and 12/31/2008 12:30 PM.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.ShortTime
member.summary: Gets the short time-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the t pattern, resulting values such as 9:00 AM, and 12:30 PM.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.LongTime
member.summary: Gets the long time-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the T pattern, resulting values such as 9:00:00 AM, and 12:30:00 PM.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.Hour
member.summary: Gets the hour-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the %H format pattern, resulting values such as 9, and 21.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.HourLeadingZero
member.summary: Gets the hour leading zero-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the HH format pattern, resulting values such as 09, and 21.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DayOfWeekInitial
member.summary: Gets the day of week initial-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the ddd format pattern and extracting only the first character, resulting values such as S, and M.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DayOfWeekTwoInitials
member.summary: Gets the day of week two initials-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the ddd format pattern and extracting only the first two characters, resulting values such as Su, and Mo.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DayOfWeekAbbreviation
member.summary: Gets the day of week abbreviation-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the ddd format pattern, resulting values such as Sun, and Mon.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DayOfWeek
member.summary: Gets the day of week-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the dddd format pattern, resulting values such as Sunday, and Monday.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.Day
member.summary: Gets the day-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the %d format pattern, resulting values such as 9, and 31.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DayLeadingZero
member.summary: Gets the day leading zero-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the dd format pattern, resulting values such as 09, and 31.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DayOfYear
member.summary: Gets the day of year-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, extracting the day of year from the specified date and time, resulting values such as 9, and 365.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.DayOfYearLeadingZero
member.summary: Gets the day of year leading zero-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, extracting the day of year from the specified date and time and formatting it using the 000 pattern, resulting values such as 009, and 365.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.WeekStartShortDate
member.summary: Gets the week start short date-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, getting the start of week date and formatting it using the d pattern, resulting values such as 1/1/2008, and 12/31/2008.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.WeekStartLongDate
member.summary: Gets the week start long date-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, getting the start of week date and formatting it using the D pattern, resulting values such as Tuesday, January 1, 2008, and Wednesday, December 31, 2008.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.NumericMonth

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.MonthAbbreviation
member.summary: Gets the month abbreviation-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the MMM format pattern, resulting values such as Sep, and Dec.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.Month
member.summary: Gets the month-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the MMMM format pattern, resulting values such as September, and December.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.MonthDay
member.summary: Gets the month and day-based instance of the TimeScaleTextFormat class, formatting the specified date and time using the M format pattern, resulting values such as January 1, and December 31.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.Year

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TimeScaleTextFormat.YearOfCentury

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.GanttChartTaskListView
member.summary: Represents a control that displays an interactive Gantt Chart with an associated task list view based on task data items. Use Items property to add task data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own task data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: IndentationMemberPath, ContentMemberPath, StartMemberPath, EffortMemberPath, CompletedEffortMemberPath, AssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath, ResourceContentMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: IsExpandedMemberPath, ScheduleMemberPath, PredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, DurationMemberPath, FinishMemberPath, IsMilestoneMemberPath, CompletionMemberPath, IsCompletedMemberPath, CostMemberPath, MinStartMemberPath, MaxStartMemberPath, MinFinishMemberPath, MaxFinishMemberPath, ResourceScheduleMemberPath, ResourceCostPerUsageMemberPath, ResourceCostPerHourMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase
member.summary: Represents the base for a control that displays an interactive Gantt Chart with an associated task list view based on task data items. Use Items property to add task data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own task data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: IndentationMemberPath, ContentMemberPath, StartMemberPath, EffortMemberPath, CompletedEffortMemberPath, AssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath, ResourceContentMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: IsExpandedMemberPath, ScheduleMemberPath, PredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, DurationMemberPath, FinishMemberPath, IsMilestoneMemberPath, CompletionMemberPath, IsCompletedMemberPath, CostMemberPath, MinStartMemberPath, MaxStartMemberPath, MinFinishMemberPath, MaxFinishMemberPath, ResourceScheduleMemberPath, ResourceCostPerUsageMemberPath, ResourceCostPerHourMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.IndentationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Int32 value on the source task item to serve as the indentation level in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the indentation level is not provided by the source task item. The hierarchy is based on the indentation level values of the tasks, so that a task with a lower index in the collection and having a specific indentation level will become the parent task for the tasks with a higher index in the collection and having an increased indentation level. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.IsExpandedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the expansion indicator in the hierarchical collection, or null to indicate that the expansion indicator is not provided by the source task item. If a parent task is expanded its child tasks become visible. If a task node is collapsed its child tasks become invisible. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ContentMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on the source task item to serve as the task content, or null to indicate that the content is not provided by the source task item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ScheduleMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Schedule value on the source task item to serve as the task schedule, or null to indicate that the schedule is not provided by the source task item. The task schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that can be used as work time for achieving completion of the task. If a child task schedule is not set, the parent task schedule is used. If a root task schedule is not set the value of the Schedule property of the TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase control is used. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.StartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task start date and time, or null to indicate that the start date and time is not provided by the source task item. The start date and time of a parent task will be based on the start date and time values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.MinStartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task minimum start date and time, or null to indicate that the minimum start date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.MaxStartMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task maximum start date and time, or null to indicate that the maximum start date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.EffortMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task effort, or null to indicate that the effort is not provided by the wrapped object. The effort of a parent task will be based on the effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.CompletedEffortMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task completed effort, or null to indicate that the completed effort is not provided by the wrapped object. The completed effort of a parent task will be based on the completed effort values of its children. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignmentsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an IEnumerable value on the source task item to serve as the task assignment item collection, or null to indicate that the assignment item collection is not provided by the source task item. You can use a collection of AssignmentItem objects as the task assignment item collection. Note that the assignment item collection is ignored for parent tasks. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source task assignment item to serve as the assigned resource item, or null to indicate that the assigned resource item is not provided by the source task assignment item. You can use a ResourceItem object as the assigned resource item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source task assignment item to serve as the task assigned allocation units value, or null to indicate that the allocation units value is not provided by the source task assignment item. The assigned allocation units value represents the percent of the resource availability to consider for the assignment, and is used when computing the task cost or can be used when determining the resource availability for a specific time interval. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.PredecessorsMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to to an IEnumerable value on the source task item to serve as the task predecessor item collection, or null to indicate that the predecessor item collection is not provided by the source task item. The predecessor item collection is used to indicate dependencies between tasks. You can use a collection of PredecessorItem objects as the task predecessor item collection. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor task item, or null to indicate that the task item is not provided by the source task predecessor item. You can use a TaskItem object as the predecessor task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DependencyType value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor dependency type, or null to indicate that the dependency type is not provided by the source task predecessor item. Predecessor dependency type indicates how the current task depends on the predecessor task. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.PredecessorLagMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on a source task predecessor item to serve as the predecessor lag, or null to indicate that the lag is not provided by the source task predecessor item. Predecessor lag indicates when the current task depends on the predecessor task. If lag is zero the dependency is applied at the appropriate time. If lag is positive the dependency is applied so that there will be an exclusion interval between the tasks. If lag is negative the dependency is applied so that there will be an intersection interval between the tasks. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.DurationMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a TimeSpan value on the source task item to serve as the task duration, or null to indicate that the duration is not provided by the source task item. Task duration is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The duration of a parent task will be based on the duration values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.FinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task finish date and time, or null to indicate that the finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. Task finish date and time is computed automatically based on schedule, start date and time, effort, and assignments. The finish date and time of a parent task will be based on the finish date and time values of its children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.MinFinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task minimum finish date and time, or null to indicate that the minimum finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.MaxFinishMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a nullable DateTime value on the source task item to serve as the task maximum finish date and time, or null to indicate that the maximum finish date and time is not provided by the source task item. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.IsMilestoneMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the task milestone indicator, or null to indicate that the milestone indicator is not provided by the source task item. A milestone task has its effort value set to zero. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.CompletionMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on the source task item to serve as the task completion rate, or null to indicate that the completion rate is not provided by the source task item. Task completion rate is computed automatically based on effort and completed effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.IsCompletedMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Boolean value on the source task item to serve as the task milestone indicator, or null to indicate that the milestone indicator is not provided by the source task item. A completed task has its completed effort value equal to effort. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignmentsStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the task assignment item collection, or null to indicate that the string representation of the assignment item collection is not provided by the source task item. The assignments string is of this form: John, Diane [80%]. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.IndexStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the index of the task, or null to indicate that the string representation of the index is not provided by the source task item. The index string is automatically computed based on the position of the task in the task collection and is of this form: 1, 2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.PredecessorsStringMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a String value on the source task item to serve as a string representation of the task predecessor item collection, or null to indicate that the string representation of the predecessor item collection is not provided by the source task item. The predecessors string is of this form: 1, 2SS, 3FF+2. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.CostMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on the source task item to serve as the task cost, or null to indicate that the cost is not provided by the source task item. Task cost can be computed automatically based on duration and assignments. The cost of a parent task will be based on the cost values of its children. However a specific task cost can be set and will be used instead if it is higher than the automatically computed cost. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignableResourceItems
member.summary: Gets the resource collection used to by this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase as available resources.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignableResourceItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a resource collection used by this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase as available resources. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ResourceContentMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an Object value on a source resource item to serve as the resource content, or null to indicate that the content is not provided by the source resource item. It is recommended to set this property. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ResourceScheduleMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Schedule value on a source resource item to serve as the resource schedule, or null to indicate that the schedule is not provided by the source resource item. The resource schedule indicates the time intervals of a day that the resource can use as work time for achieving completion of a task, restricting the task schedule further. If the resource schedule is not set it means that the resource can use any time interval as work time, and the task schedule is not restricted. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ResourceCostPerUsageMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source resource item to serve as the resource cost per usage, or null to indicate that the cost per usage is not provided by the source resource item. The resource cost per usage is applied when computing a task cost, one time for each assignment, without considering the task duration or the assigned allocation units. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ResourceCostPerHourMemberPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to a Double value on a source resource item to serve as the resource cost per hour, or null to indicate that the cost per hour is not provided by the source resource item. The resource cost per hour is applied when computing a task cost, proportionally for each assignment, considering the task duration and the assigned allocation units. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.TaskManager
member.summary: Gets the TaskManager object that is used internally for managing tasks displayed by this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.TaskManagerSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom TaskManager object to use internally within this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase. When this property is set to a task manager instance the control items collection and the associated data member properties are ignored. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ManagedTasks
member.summary: Gets the task collection managed by this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignableResourceManager
member.summary: Gets the ResourceManager object that is used internally for managing assignable resources used by this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.ManagedAssignableResources
member.summary: Gets the assignable resource collection managed by this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase.AssignableResourceCount
member.summary: Gets the count of assignable resources managed by this TaskGanttChartNodeListViewBase. This is a dependency property.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.LoadChartView
member.summary: Represents a control that displays an interactive Load Chart based on resource data items. Use Items property to add resource data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own resource data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: ContentMemberPath, TaskIndentationMemberPath, TaskContentMemberPath, TaskStartMemberPath, TaskEffortMemberPath, TaskCompletedEffortMemberPath, TaskAssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: ScheduleMemberPath, CostPerUsageMemberPath, CostPerHourMemberPath, TaskIsExpandedMemberPath, TaskScheduleMemberPath, TaskPredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, TaskDurationMemberPath, TaskFinishMemberPath, TaskIsMilestoneMemberPath, TaskCompletionMemberPath, TaskIsCompletedMemberPath, TaskCostMemberPath, TaskMinStartMemberPath, TaskMaxStartMemberPath, TaskMinFinishMemberPath, TaskMaxFinishMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.

member.name: T:DlhSoft.Windows.Controls.ResourceGanttChartViewBase
member.summary: Represents the base for a control that displays an interactive Gantt Chart based on resource data items. Use Items property to add resource data items to an ItemCollection managed by the control, or set ItemsSource to your own resource data item collection. It is recommended to set at least these data member properties: ContentMemberPath, TaskIndentationMemberPath, TaskContentMemberPath, TaskStartMemberPath, TaskEffortMemberPath, TaskCompletedEffortMemberPath, TaskAssignmentsMemberPath, AssignmentResourceItemMemberPath, AssignmentAllocationUnitsMemberPath. These data member properties can also be set: ScheduleMemberPath, CostPerUsageMemberPath, CostPerHourMemberPath, TaskIsExpandedMemberPath, TaskScheduleMemberPath, TaskPredecessorsMemberPath, PredecessorTaskItemMemberPath, PredecessorDependencyTypeMemberPath, PredecessorLagMemberPath, TaskDurationMemberPath, TaskFinishMemberPath, TaskIsMilestoneMemberPath, TaskCompletionMemberPath, TaskIsCompletedMemberPath, TaskCostMemberPath, TaskMinStartMemberPath, TaskMaxStartMemberPath, TaskMinFinishMemberPath, TaskMaxFinishMemberPath. Alternatively you can set the TaskManagerSource to a customized task manager to use and to ignore the items collection and any associated data member properties. It is recommended to use a single TaskManager instance for each set of distinct task data items and data member properties at any specific time, and to use the Dispose method to release the resources used by an instance that is no longer needed.
